scripts.db:push: set -a; test -f ../../.env && . ../../.env; set +a; prisma db push
scripts.db:seed:questions: set -a; test -f ../../.env && . ../../.env; set +a; SEED_MODE=questions_only tsx prisma/seed.ts
scripts.db:seed:community: set -a; test -f ../../.env && . ../../.env; set +a; SEED_MODE=questions_only SEED_COMMUNITY_BOOST=true SEED_RANDOM_USER_COUNT=50 SEED_RANDOM_COMMENT_COUNT=500 tsx prisma/seed.ts
scripts.db:seed:community:cleanup: set -a; test -f ../../.env && . ../../.env; set +a; SEED_MODE=community_cleanup tsx prisma/seed.ts
